results.description:
Original indicia was Abe Sapien: Dark and Terrible before becoming an ongoing series.

Sequentially issue #1 is considered 11 in the series.

Collected Editions

  • Abe Sapien: Dark and Terrible and the New Race of Man (#1-5)
  • Abe Sapien: The Shape of Things To Come (#6-7 and 9-11)
  • Abe Sapien: Sacred Places (#12-14 and 16-17)
  • Abe Sapien: A Darkness So Great (#18-22)
  • Abe Sapien: The Secret Fire (#24-26, 28-29 and 31)
  • Abe Sapien: The Desolate Shore (#32-36)
